text: He muminagana! Tomara n'yayabicare drrha pratisthita thakabe allahara saksisbarupa; yadi'o ta tomadera nijedera ba pita-mata ebam atmiya-sbajanera birud'dhe haya; se bittabana hoka ba bittahina hoka allaha ubhayera'i ghanistatara. Kaje'i tomara n'yayabicara karate prabrttira anugami hayo na. Yadi tomara pemcalo katha bala ba pasa katiye ya'o tabe tomara ya kara allaha to tara samyaka khabara rakhena
